In the room next to Rodimus Prime, Tucson Prime's expressions change to tho=
se of sheer determination yet deeply intrenched in thought, as if calculati=
ng his next move.  He had always been the strategic type, and as if plannin=
g his next move in a game of chess, he narrows his brow and not one word co=
mes out of his mouth, except...

"Not on my watch."  

Which was also what =
he had said in his sub conscious.  

As Night Shift, Rat Trap and Straight =
Shot watch, they look to Kup and nodd, yet, what comes out of Tucson's mout=
h causes them to turn on a heel.   Straight Shot sees the determination in =
his face.  A determination he had when he first faced Hydras before he beca=
me a Prime.

" Ohhh I think whoever has Rodimus Prime under their control i=
s gonna have their tendrils full with Tucson.  That's it Tucson, you can do=
 it, you got your name for a reason."

Rat Trap watches carefully.

" If an=
yone get get Rodimus outa that jam it's Wheels.  He didn't let Hydras stop =
'em and now he ain't gonna let any oversized bug stop 'em either."

Night S=
hift follows Straight Shot and Talon.

" Talon, you can bet your spark that=
 Tucson Prime's gonna come outa this with Rodimus just fine.  Tucson got hi=
s name for a reason, like Straight Shot said, every mech gets his or her na=
me depending on his spark, and lemme tell ya Tucson's got one heck of a spa=
rk, and a back bone. Okay, let's get ta the CR chamber'n get Nightlight'n W=
indlord back online where they belong."

As Straight Shot follows Night Shi=
ft, Rat Trap stays with the others, including Quickstride, Silverbolt, Noct=
oro, Ramhorn, and Bump, carefully watching his newly found friend's every m=
ove.  There was a power there, a power that even Tucson himself couldn't ex=
plain.  Again, another indication of strength, as Tucson begins to grip his=
 fist tightly with a narrowing brow.
